title: Do Bless & Tim REALLY Know Video Game Music?! - Kinda Funny Gamescast
description:
This episode is sponsored by BetterHelp — go to http://betterhelp.com/kindafunny to get 10% off your first month.

Check out the quiz on kaBoonio Gaming's page here: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=EAjnAQr6LKY

00:03:07 - Housekeeping

00:21:14 - Easy
00:34:00 - Normal
00:49:42 - Hard - NO PAUSING
